item.title: Adventures with ONT MinION at MBL's Microbial Diversity Course
item.description: My time here at the Microbial Diversity Course at MBL has come to an end after visiting for the past 2 weeks with our lab's MinION to sequence genomes from bacterial isolates that students collected from the Trunk River in Woods Hole, MA. (Photo by Jared Leadbetter of 'Ectocooler' Tenacibaculum …
item.dc:creator: monsterbashseq
